return policy: You can return products within 30 days of purchase, provided the item is unused and in original packaging.
shipping time: Orders are processed within 24 hours and usually arrive in 3-5 business days depending on your location.
payment methods: We accept major credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, and PayPal.
cancellation policy: Orders can be cancelled within 12 hours of purchase. After that, cancellation is not guaranteed.
support hours: Our customer support team is available 24/7 via chat and email.
international shipping: Yes, we ship internationally. Delivery time varies by country and customs processing.
warranty: All electronics come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Other items may vary.
refunds: Refunds are processed within 7 business days once the returned item is received and inspected.
